title: Re: Xenophage Freeware Release
content:
It's cool that many of these older games are getting freeware. I've never played Xenophage myself, perhaps I should try it now. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."
